title: NPR's Book of the Day: Hand-picked Great Reads, Everyday From NPR.
description: Want to find a good read? Or just keep up with the books everyone's talking about? NPR's Book of the Day gives you today's very best storytelling in a snackable, searchable, pocket-sized podcast. Whether you're looking to engage with the ideas and issues of our times – or temporarily escape from them – we have an author who will speak to you, all genres, moods and writing styles included. Today's great books in 15 minutes or less.
copyright: Copyright 2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
